Reviews.Title: DO NOT WASTE YOUR MONEY
Reviews.Author: andrea
Reviews.Content: i DIDN'T EVEN KNOW THIS WAS USED....IT NEVER GETS CHARGED AND ITS SLOW WHEN IT COMES TO CLICKINBG ON WHAT YOU WANT..INTERNET IS FAST BUT IT'S NEVER ON SINCE IT WONT TAKE THE CHARGE EVEN THROUGH THE WHOLE NIGHT...CUSTOMER SERVICE WAS CONTACTED SO I'M STILL WAITING FOR A RESPONSE....WILL LET YOU GUYS KNOW IF ANY CHANGE IS MADE

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy Q i827
Reviews.Author: Michael J.
Reviews.Content: The performance of the phone is good. The reason why I gave it 3 stars is because the seller says that there is no carrier logos on the casing, its just software configure for the carrier. Well, there is the at&t; logo on the casing. It's not like it hinders the performance of the phone.. I am very particular on the items I get online. Just a little disappointing coz it's not what he says it is.

Reviews.Title: Came in a timely manner, love it!
Reviews.Author: InuOkami
Reviews.Content: came a couple days earlier then projected, the setup was bare-minimum, love this phone was excatly what i paid for, however the seller stated this phone is an Samsung Galaxy Ace Q, when actually its a Samsung Galaxy Appeal....i'm particular on what i purchase, even though the seller was a little dishonest, overall I'm giving this 5 stars regardless.

Reviews.Title: great buy
Reviews.Author: Raquel
Reviews.Content: i have this same phone (i didnt buy it from amazon) but its nice ive dropped this phone many many times and its still working! great buy

Reviews.Title: My daughter loves it
Reviews.Author: Yeoman Johnson
Reviews.Content: I bought this phone for my daughter. she does not have a T-mobile data plan, and this unlocked phone lets her connect to the internet by wi-if, and not pay extra. She loves it, and for $80 you can't beat the price.

Reviews.Title: Very disappointed
Reviews.Author: Elisha
Reviews.Content: The phone was not unlocked. It's a simple as that. When I called to ask what could be done from the seller, they suggested I purchase a code offline form a 3rd party. I purchased this phone for my mother and ended up having to send it back (with full refund) as the item as not as described.

Reviews.Title: best buy yet
Reviews.Author: Jim Audet
Reviews.Content: someone told me it was good so I got two and they are perfect. They even arrived three days faster than they said it would. For the money they are a steal.

Reviews.Title: Defective phone
Reviews.Author: Glenn E Kater
Reviews.Content: After our initial problem appearing to be a defective battery, for the sake of expediency and having signed up with a cell phone service, I decided to just purchase a new battery ($44 plus 10mi.). Having installed the new battery on 4/29/14, placing the phone on charge for the day, the problem still exists.  After charging all day (the phone gets noticeably warm during this process), then turning the phone off overnight, when turned on this morning a warning for needing charging appeared. I have concluded the problem is with the phone, not the battery.  Having had the phone for less than two weeks and it was marketed as a "NEW" phone, the experience has been very disappointing. I am going to return this phone to Amazon and will assume that that process is easy, as promised.

Reviews.Title: Get what you pay for
Reviews.Author: slavko
Reviews.Content: I got this phone to replace a Galaxy Stratosphere and found it to be similar but much slower to respond to keystrokes. I really like a dedicated keyboard but, the operating system seems sluggish. Front and rear camera are ok but, doesn't have a flash which limits picture taking.  Over all it's ok, would make a decent cheap first phone for a casual user.

Reviews.Title: Love this phone!
Reviews.Author: Mari Vaccaro
Reviews.Content: This is by far my favorite phone I've had so far! I am so happy with the slide out keyboard ( with actual buttons) I looked all over for a phone like this and they were way out of my price range. I am always a bit leery of buying anything refurbished, but my phone is working great & I am very happy with it! It is perfect and just like brand new, I would've never guessed it was a refurnished phone. Would highly recommend it to anyone who, like me, loves the smart phone but hates the touchscreen keyboard. It also came way faster than I thought it would, so I was really happy about that, too! :)

Reviews.Title: Fine Phone
Reviews.Author: shydra
Reviews.Content: I like this phone it has worked out well for my needs. The only thing I can say is a little disappointing is that the battery life is not very long even when on standby but other than that the phone is a good phone for the price.
